title: Watch over Japan
creator_credit: Geoffrey Collings and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Australian troops formed part of the Allied occupation forces in Japan after World war II; this film gives us a glimpse of the life of these BCOF men in Japan.
creator_credit_for_label: Geoffrey Collings and Australian National Film Board
